item.title: Multilevel Regression with Post Stratification: popular vote points to the victory of Joe Biden
item.description: Abstract The result of the 2020 presidential election in the US has been a pressing topic.

item.title: Bayesian binary regression model: a link between childhood maltreatment and aduldhood victimization
item.description: Abstract Childhood abuse and maltreatment have been determined to increase the risk of criminal behavior.
